org.opcfoundation.ua.application

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opcfoundation.ua.application.Application

  • public class Application
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the mechanisms that are commong for both client and server application.
    See Also:
    OPC UA Client Application, OPC UA Server Application
